attributes.review: This is absolutely the WORSTTTT app that I have ever purchased. I simply have no more words. I am DISGUSTED. Whoever owns this trump platform oughta be ashamed.
attributes.title: Ban this app. This is absolutely the worst app I have ever downloaded. do NOT recommend .

attributes.review: the moment i opened the app i felt like i was about to soil my trousers from utter disgust.  i could more than smell the racism , transphobia, xenophobia, homophobia, and sexism radiating off the app. i could feel it in my soul. i felt like my body would decompose after a few glances at it. deleted it after a few seconds. downright putrid. 🤢🤢🍤🍤🍤🍤
attributes.title: downright repulsive

attributes.review: There was a picture of a very old man who looked like a dry raisin. My eyes hurt and my dog is scared to look at my phone again. Thanks a lot, now my parents disowned me.
